=== Current Issues ===

* Resume from Sleep/Hibernate/Suspend doesn't work probably because of ATI driver issues. Maybe some tweaks are needed.

* WLAN and WIFI/Browser/Fan Buttons need some tweaks in order to work. See this topic for instructions: <nowiki>[[http://www.amilo-forum.com/topic,1029,-Li1718-auto-installation-for-ubuntu-32bit-Testers-needed.html|Li1718 auto installation for ubuntu 32bit]]</nowiki>

=== System Info ===

* '''bios-version:''' V1.7
* '''system-manufacturer:''' FUJITSU SIEMENS
* '''system-product-name:''' AMILO Li 1718
* '''system-version:''' Not Specified
* '''Chipset:''' ATI RC415ME + SB460
* '''CPU:''' Intel® Core™ Duo
* '''HDD:''' 160GB SATA (5400rpm)
* '''ODD:''' 8x Multi-format DVD burner with double layer
* '''Display:''' 15.4” TFT WXGA, 1280 x 800 pixel
* '''ACPI functions:''' S1 standby (LCD off); S3 save to RAM; S4 save to disk; S5 soft off
* '''Graphics:''' ATI Radeon Xpress 200M with up to 256MB HyperMemory™
* '''I/O Interfaces:''' 4x USB (version 2.0); 1x VGA (VESA compatible); 1x DC-In; 1x RJ11 for modem 56 Kbps (.V92); 1x RJ45 for LAN (10/100); 1x line out shared with headphone out (stereo); 1x line in shared with microphone in (mono)
* '''Communications:''' Built-in 56Kbps, .V92 fax modem (MDC 1.5); Realtek Semiconductor Co. Ltd. RTL-8139/8139C/8139C+ 10/100Mbps LAN; Atheros Communications Inc. AR5007EG 802.11 b/g Wireless LAN (WLAN) solution
